title: Creator Management - Linked Creators
content:
**This feature is only available for** [MCN/CAP](https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docx/YVSSdFlS4olNfdxSPjecs8kYnOg) **partners on TTSPC**. Available Market: US, UK,ID,MY,VN,TH,PH,SG ## What is linked Creator? Creator Management is a set of features that enable MCN/CAP to check and manage creator partnership/data/fee agreement linking relationships in an official way.
## Feature Introduction To build partnerships with creators, you can go to [creator management]‚û§ [manage partnerships] page and manage linking relationships with creators Note: if you are a **cross-border partner** and have multiple market certifications of "creator management ", you can switch the market as follows. After that, you can check and use features under the chosen market.
### **How to Link with new creatorsÔºü** #### **Step 1: Go to [creator management] ‚û§ [manage partnerships] and click [Add new creators].** NoteÔºö 1. Under the "creator management" category, you can only link with **non-official and non-marketing** creator accounts and creators **in the same market.** 1. Eg. If you are a cross-border partner and have TH and UK market certification, when you add UK creator, UK creator will be added under UK market certification automatically and you can check the linking data by switching to the "UK market"
#### **Step 2: Fill in the TikTok account user name and expiration date** Note: in United Kingdom, Indonesia, Vietnam, Singapore , Malaysia, and the Philippines. for the first linking relationship, the maximum linking period is two months . After first linking, the maximum linking period is one year. In Thailand, the maximum linking period is one year no matter if it's first linking or not.
#### **Step 3: Creator receives linking request** After you send the link request, your creator can check **[Account Linking Request]** as below and approve or decline the request. üìå **Note:** The expiration date of linking request is 7 days . If creator doesn't reply in 7 days, you need resend the request | 1.[Inbox] -[Monetization]- [Account Linking Request] | 2.[TikTok Shop]-[Notification]- [Account Linking Request] | 3.[TikTok Shop]- [Partnerships]- [Account Linking Request] | | --- | --- | --- | | ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/93b81b8493434e7f9521b1e1f8c04e92~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/19ea1ba9179d493e8e43e55fbe4ebc98~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/9c24defb8e0c4d4d969ed76fa9704084~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/0e63a5cd94cc49528ec4ca3a1389418e~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/f40ba231877d4b94952232a8dbdbbbfa~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/e46c7cc34b3e47af8765bc85a216c22c~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)

| After clicking the message, the creator can go to request a link to the account page to choose decline or approve ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/e083d9754c89414091e2a18470d02f4a~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ### How to check and manage the linking statusÔºü You can check the linking status on managed partnerships . The description and actions under different tabs are as follows: | Tab name | Description | Actions | Screenshot | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | All | All linking relationship | Same as the following tab | ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/123c6f56837345f4a8466194ddcd344c~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| | Linked | Linking status, creator approved linking request initiated by the partner | 1. **Remove**

You can cancel the linking relationship with creator by clicking the [remove] button . After that, the linked relationship will be canceled

2. **Extend**

You can click the [extend] button to renew the linking expiration date with creator.
*Extend will be available when the linking period is shorter than 1month | ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/55ffdd79586942d98a069b47ef9d19db~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| | Not linked | Linked declined
> Creator declines the linking request from MCN | You can click [Request again] to resend linking request | | | | Unlinked
> Partner removed creator | | ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/4c0d89622a7745a5be45a41614b064c8~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| | | Request expired
> The linking request has expired and has not been responded to by creators **in 7 days** | | ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/bd033e962cac43059a1eeb398a27635d~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| | | Link expired
> The linking relationship between creator and the partner expires | | ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/80f5f6f129194b2b8ed0f220ee8af37b~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) | | Link requested | In the linking application status, the creator side has not yet responded to the linking application initiated by the partner | You need to wait for the creator to respond after sending the link request . If you haven't received any response from creator in 7 days, the link request will expire and move to [Request expired] tab | ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/7ad00ba79e0e42e1bf1b8b5a9b4b3db4~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| | Unlink requested | Partner has not yet responded to the unlink application initiated by creator | You can click approve or decline to creator's unlink request
NoteÔºöthe unlink request expiration is 7 days, if you don't respond to creator's request, the linking relationship will still valid. | | ### How to cancel the linking relationship with creatorÔºü #### If Creator raises unlink request 1. A creator can send an unlink request and provide a reason for unlinking via the partner linking page. As the partner, you will receive an email notification with the subject **'Your creator sent you an unlink request'**. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/eefc512698c8462186619ab9f77cfe60~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/c61ea8be8c51484da0de41265121e40d~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
2. You can then go to the **[Unlink Requested]** tab to view the request. You have **7 days** to either approve or decline it. * If you click **[Approve]**, the linking relationship will be cancelled, and it will appear under the **[Not Linked]** tab. * If you click **[Decline]**, the relationship will remain valid and stay under the **[Linked]** tab.
If no action is taken within 7 days, you will receive another email informing you that the request has expired, and **the creator will remain linked**. The creator may submit a second request, and **if this second request is also ignored for 7 days, the creator will be unlinked automatically.** #### If MCN/CAP Raise unlink requests For Non-UK Market, MCN/CAP can unlink with Creator without creators' permission For UK Market, If MCN/CAP raise unlink requests on TTSPC:[manage partnership] ‚û§ [remove], this record will go to ‚ÄúUnlink Requested" tab
Creator will receive a message "Unlink request from agency" through: * [inbox]-[Monetization] * [TTS]-[Notification center] * Partnerships Creator will receive a message "Unlink request from agency" through: * [inbox]-[Monetization] * [TTS]-[Notification center] * Partnerships * If creator accepts the unlink request, the linking relationship with the agency will end and MCN will not be able to access creators' data. MCN unlinked request will be moved to the **[Not link-unlinked]** tab. * If the creator has not replied **in 7 days**.The unlink request will be automatically approved and MCN unlinked request will be moved to the **[Not link-unlinked]** tab.
If creator declines the unlink request from MCN, then the linking relationship will still be valid before expiration, the MCN unlinked request will be moved to linked tab.
### How to extend the linking relationship with creatorÔºü We will start to remind you that your linking relationship with this account will expire within one month. For creator/merchant that will expire within 15 days, we will update the remaining binding days every day. If you still want to continue to cooperate with this account, please extend the linking in time to avoid affecting the incentive policy.
Step 1 You can click the [extend]button to renew the linking expiration date with creator.
Step 2 Fill in the corresponding account expiry date. **Note : The default renewal start time begins with the last binding expiration time**
Step 3 The linked creator account agrees to the extended invitation on TikTok Creator can check the extended partnership message as belowÔºö | 1. [Inbox] -[Monetization]- [Extend Partnership] | [TikTok Shop]-[Notification]- [Extend Partnership] | [TikTok Shop]- [Partnerships]- [Extend Partnership] | | --- | --- | --- | | ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/be54dc6ea4a24eb3bed42d8843545c17~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/04f1d7028df34d8b9f8b04b2bec01a66~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/bf21d80ccafe46a386218008a4387f31~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)

| ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/0e81a72828404c2e99c5a2bcebf1a9a2~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/54dffde891ff412da5d6cfd4635b4ad8~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
| After clicking the message,the creator can go to extend partnership and choose decline or extend. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/1a5271ce1e57470a86c24e81307706ae~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) # FAQ ## Q1. Why are the extend buttons of some accounts not available?
Because the partner tried to initiate an extended invitation to this account, but the creator account rejected the request or did not check the request within 7 days ## Q2ÔºöWhat happens if the binding to the TikTok account has expired but the extension is initiated and the TikTok account has not confirmed the extended invitation before expiration? (egÔºö the binding period between partner A and account B expired on March 25, and the partner initiated the extended invitation on March 20, but account B still did not accept the extended invitation until March 25) AÔºöIf you still want to cooperate with this account, please find the corresponding account in the „Äênot linked„Äë tab and apply for binding again.
